nodes.text: How did you learn how to pick locks?
It is just something ve are all taught as children like how to build fires in the forest, how to hunt, how to read portents, and how to dance.
You never know vhat skills can save your life.
Arrrghh. This is so stupid!
I don't think of it as disarming a trap. I think of it as solving a puzzle. It's all a matter of coming up with likely letters and probable words.
Yeah, but real puzzles don't zap your hand or blow up in your face.
I try not to think about that part.
Very well, Herr O'Conner, show to me how you disarm the trap and unlock the safe door.
Okay, first I disarm the trap...
Ah, good. That takes care of the trap. Time to pick the lock...
Hmmm... this looks like an advanced lock of the Houdini class. Tricky - and it takes a Houdini 42 to open it.
One more turn... And it's open!
Sehr gut, Herr O'Conner. Fr√§ulein Esme will be the next to disarm this trap. You may continue with your day.
No. Grrr... I... can't do it.
I knew I should have gotten a Houdini...

nodes.message: Letting this fall through to Fail message
Not sure how we want to handle this case - for now treating it as a fail, but we might want to warn and force the player to try again at least once? Could get pretty nested in branches, though

nodes.text: Disappointing, Herr O'Conner. Extremely disappointing.
You may leave now. Raus!
That will be all for now. You may go.
Sir, I'm afraid I don't have a Trap Tapper with me at the moment. I must have left it in my room. Mind if I borrow one?
Then you are wasting my time. Dismissed.
